The realistic motion by physical operation is [ no one but / Doppelganger Inc. ]!! [How to play] This game is a game which advances Sugoroku using coin, beats a boss, raises a level, and increases coin. * Automatic save functional loading [1] Lower [Push Insert Coin!! ] The tap of the button is carried out and coin is dropped from a top. * The place dropped with the position which carries out a tap can be chosen. The number of coin is displayed on the upper part of the middle-of-the-screen part screen. [2] The item chosen when coin passed the [Role] section in right and left appears. * Refer to the page [ next ] item list. [3] If coin is dropped to screen this side [WIN ZONE], the number of coin will increase. * It will become effective if an item is also dropped on [WIN ZONE] in addition to this. [4] If jewelry is dropped to [WIN ZONE], the event of the grid which the character progressed and stopped at Sugoroku of a front screen will happen. * The number of Massu which progresses with jewelry is different. reviews.title: Annoying
reviews.comment: At times, doesn\'t give you a chance to have a breather during the coins dropping. Keeps going on and on. Not really challenging xx
reviews.author: Carol Keaney

reviews.title: Do not download
reviews.comment: Advertising on coin button forcing you to open them. C mon developers what you trying to pull here this should be banned from playstore...
reviews.author: Martin Szilagyi

reviews.title: Its funky golden coin bomber again
reviews.comment: Apart from different graphics and sound, including a really irritating tune, this is \'funky golden coin bomber\' all over again. The game elements and gameplay are identical as far as I can see. Thats Ok if you dont have the first one, but there really is no need for this one if you do. Oh and this one does have a few graphical glitches.
reviews.author: A Google User
